summary.description:
Today, a bit warmer for the inside temperature (up 1.7°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 15%).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 285 m) and outside humidity (down 7%) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s cloud levels is 459.4m lower than yesterday, 285.1m lower than past week, 255.1m lower than past month.

The cloud levels yesterday fell between 412m minimum and 1807m maximum, with an average of 594.1m; weekly and monthly averages were marginally higher at 879.2m and 849.2m.
cloud levels.summary: The sky will be mostly cloudy (or even foggy) with low clouds.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; pleasant, mild temperatures. Also, the atmosphere will feel parched and dry and winds will be practically absent. Possible light showers, the sky will be mostly cloudy (or even foggy) with low clouds, and the light is absent. Weather patterns to stay the same.
